Row.Text: Our people are too now building pyramids and have adopted your gods! I am worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

O' Great Pharaoh, our priests bemoan the state of our temples and religious monuments. We are practically begging a displeased diety to smite our people. Let us rennovate the Temple of Amun and other religious sites that the heavens may be sated and Nubia's glory restored.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Nubia [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have a State / Majority Religion [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must own their Religion's Holy City [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Philosophy [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have Temples in all cities [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Faith} [ICON_PEACE] Faith [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold From Temples [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith From Royal Pyramids [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Grand Temple is built in your Religion's Holy City [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The empire enters a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age

O' Great Pharaoh, our priests bemoan the state of our temples and religious monuments. We are practically begging a displeased diety to smite our people. Let us rennovate the Temple of Amun and other religious sites that the heavens may be sated and Nubia's glory restored.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold From Temples [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith From Royal Pyramids [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Grand Temple is built in your Religion''s Holy City [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The empire enters a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age

Nubian metalwork has recently become very valuable, both within our nation and amongst our neighbours. We can help our metalsmiths establish additional forges and blast furnaces throughout our empire to take advantage of this.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Nubia [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Iron Working [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free Forge in your first four Cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Forges extend Trade Route range by 25%

Nubian metalwork has recently become very valuable, both within our nation and amongst our neighbours. We can help our metalsmiths establish additional forges and blast furnaces throughout our empire to take advantage of this.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free Forge in your first four Cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Forges extend Trade Route range by 25%
